original_title: Billy Joel: The Stranger 30th Anniversary Edition
overview: This bonus DVD showcasing two live promotional videos from "The Stranger" and the long-awaited release of Billy's fabled appearance on the BBC's "Old Grey Whistle Test," a seldom-seen sixty minute cavalcade from 1978 that has aired only once on the UK's BBC2.
title: Billy Joel: The Stranger 30th Anniversary Edition
